sentence.Network_en: They found connections between these duplicate maps and the intraparietal sulcus.

sentence.Network_en: Methods: Intraocular lens was implanted at ciliary sulcus and remains capsular membrane.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To localize precisely cerebral central sulcus on the coronal MR imaging.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...硬膜下隙(subdural space):硬脑膜与蛛网膜之间的空隙。回间沟(sulcus):位于颈3—颈7的椎管内,用以容纳和保护神经根。上方的(superior):指位于某一参照点的上方。在人体解剖上,通常指相对参照点更接近头部的位置。.

...比较重要的脑沟有外侧沟,lateral sulcus,起于半球下面,行向后上方,至上外侧面,中央沟,central sulcus,起于半球上绿中点稍后方,斜向前下方,下端与外侧沟隔一脑回,上端延伸至半球内侧面,顶枕沟,parie.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, furrow, wrinkle'

means.word_mean: 1. (anatomy) any of the narrow grooves in an organ or tissue especially those that mark the convolutions on the surface of the brain
